parameters.name: AccountName
parameters.description: The sender address configured in the console.

parameters.name: ClickTrace
parameters.description:
- 1: Enables the data tracking feature.

- 0 (default): Disables the data tracking feature.

parameters.name: Headers
parameters.description: You can add the standard fields \`Message-ID\`, \`List-Unsubscribe\`, and \`List-Unsubscribe-Post\` to the message header. These standard fields overwrite existing values. Non-standard fields must start with \`X-User-\` and are appended to the message header. A maximum of 10 message headers can be passed in JSON format. All fields must comply with standard header syntax.

parameters.name: IpPoolId
parameters.description: The ID of the dedicated IP address pool. If you have purchased dedicated IP addresses, you can use this parameter to specify the egress IP address for this email sending.

parameters.name: ReceiversName
parameters.description: The name of a pre-created recipient list to which recipients have been uploaded. Note: Do not delete the recipient list for at least 10 minutes after the task is triggered. Otherwise, the email sending may fail.

parameters.name: ReplyAddressAlias
parameters.description: The alias for the reply-to address.

parameters.name: TagName
parameters.description: The name of the email tag.

parameters.name: TemplateName
parameters.description: The name of a pre-created and approved template.

parameters.name: UnSubscribeFilterLevel
parameters.description:
The filtering level. For more information, see [Unsubscribe link generation and filtering mechanism]().

- disabled: No filtering.

- default: Uses the default policy. Batch emails are filtered at the sender address level.

- mailfrom: Filters at the sender address level.

- mailfrom\_domain: Filters at the email domain level.

- edm\_id: Filters at the account level.

parameters.name: UnSubscribeLinkType
parameters.description:
The type of unsubscribe link to generate. For more information, see [Unsubscribe link generation and filtering mechanism]().

- disabled: Does not generate a link.

- default: Uses the default policy. An unsubscribe link is generated when batch emails are sent from a sender address to specific domains, such as those containing the keywords "gmail", "yahoo", "google", "aol.com", "hotmail", "outlook", or "ymail.com".

- zh-cn: Generates a link for future content instrumentation.

- en-us: Generates a link for future content instrumentation.
